idea:
OKIE DIGITECH PRIVATE LIMITED is one of the renowned in india which was rapidly grown, up to now. We, as importers and factory assemblers of smart phones, feature phones, battery, led tv, sound system, for many years have been committed to providing customers with beautiful sound quality, innovative products with independent intellectual property rights. Our aim is to create the best quality products, and to provide maximum value for customers!


Our products, especially leagoo smartphones, speakers & led tv with soundbar, resonate in the industry, attracting lots of new excellent customers every year. We have established a long-term win-win cooperation relationship with them as we are not doing any ordinary product, we are doing a product which can create maximum value for our customers and provide the best quality. Okie Electronics Is Part Of Okie Venture Group, Known For Manufacturing, Gaming And Healthcare.


OKIE ELECTRONICS IS PART OF OKIE VENTURE GROUP , KNOWN FOR MANUFACTURING, GAMING AND HEALTHCARE.
name: OKIE DIGITECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Vimla polymers is a premiere manufacturer of a wide range of international quality BOPP/PP bags with an established presence in packaging of Rice, Food Grains, Spices, Pulses, Wheat, Flour, Seeds, Fertilisers, Feed, Salt, Sugar, Detergent, etc.

Vimla Polymers a company headquartered In Mumbai, Maharashtra.

VIMLA POLYMERS is one of India’s fastest growing manufacturer supplier and exporter of BOPP( Bi-axially oriented polypropylene) & PP ( Polypropylene)

Laminated woven bags with nearly 2 years of experience in the production of packaging products.

Vimla Polymers offers a long innovative range of BOPP and PP bags which have attractive design I.e. MATT, METALLIC, GLOSSY, 3D superfine printability, long life and strength, easy handling, detail artwork superior optical properties. Besides, the products can be customised in different specifications as per the stringent requirements of clients:

         •Multicolour Printed BOPP Laminated PP woven sacks / bags (5kg to 50kg)

          •Single/ Both side multicolour printed BOPP Laminated PP woven bags.

Multicolour Printed BOPP Laminated PP woven bags with:

        •with gusset

        •with handle and D cut

        •with liner

        •Back seam bag

        •Easy open bags
name: Vimla Polymers Private Limited

idea:
Buffering is a data led media tech platform that is here to revolutionise the Media Tech industry. With a humongous reach of 400 Mn prospective users on a PAN India basis, Buffering provides the perfect blend of online and offline media with digital technology.


Our presence in the outdoor marketing space is unparalleled. We provide access to more than 10,000 active outdoor hoarding sites across premium locations of the country including presence in metros, Tier I, Tier II and Tier III cities, state and national highways that helps in establishing the presence of your brand. Unlike other players, we co invest in the facelift of your brand through outdoor and digital media by bearing some portion of the cost involved in your marketing campaigns.

 

Buffering manages more than 60 renowned and high profile personalities/brands across the country predominantly in the media and entertainment industry. Some of our major associations include partnerships as the technology and digital partners for release of bollywood movies like Sooryavanshi, Antim, 83, Tadap, Runway 34, RRR, KGF, Vikram, Major, The Kashmir Files, Charlie 777 and several others. We also cater to a few major brands in the real estate and fashion industry.

 

Our data and technology first approach has helped Buffering gain an exclusive access to users across the country with which includes very authentic information about spending patterns, EdTech, FinTech choices made over the last 5 years.
name: SKK BRAND MEDIA RESEARCH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Counted among the list of top manufacturers and suppliers, we, Qcc Lab Solutions Pvt. Ltd., have been able to gather a huge customer base. It is the support of our certified professionals, vendors, logistics partners, etc., which has allowed us to earn a good name and fame in the engineering industry. We are specialized in manufacturing of Soil testing equipment, Concrete testing equipment, Cement testing equipment, Bitumen testing equipment, Aggregate testing equipment, Rock testing equipment, Mechanical testing equipment etc., that are flawless in performance. The components used by us to make the range are restive against corrosion, long-lasting, and high in tensile strength. It is ensured by our quality controllers that the entire production process is carrying out in accordance with the international industrial norms. Before this manufactured range is delivered to customers, it is made sure that products are fluent in performance, easy to handle and requires less maintenance.
name: QCC LAB SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
